== General ==

 - http://griffon.codehaus.org/Quick+Start
Describes step by step how to build your first Griffon application.

 - http://griffon.codehaus.org/Builders
Documentation and links to the various Griffon builders.

 - http://griffon.codehaus.org/Plugins
List of available plugins.

== Griffon Guide ==

Located at $GRIFFON_HOME/guide
Online at http://griffon.codehaus.org/guide/latest/

== Javadocs ==

Located at $GRIFFON_HOME/guide/api

== Mailing Lists ==

 - user@griffon.codehaus.org
 - dev@griffon.codehaus.org

Go to http://xircles.codehaus.org/projects/griffon/lists to manage your
subscriptions. 

== Links ==

 - http://griffoncast.com
Todd Costella produces and hosts a series of screencasts on Griffon.

 - http://grailspodcast.com
The Groovy, Grails and Griffon podcast, hosted by Sven Haiges (@hansamann),
Glen Smith (@glen_a_smith) and Peter Ledbrook (@pledbrook).

 - http://groovyblogs.org
Feed aggregator on Groovy news and blogs. Created and maintained by Glen Smith
(it runs on Grails!).

 - http://groovy.dzone.com
Online community of Groovy news.
